verses.name: Romans 11:7
verses.text: What then? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for; but the election hath obtained it, and the rest were blinded

verses.name: Romans 11:8
verses.text: (According as it is written, God hath given them the spirit of slumber, eyes that they should not see, and ears that they should not hear;) unto this day.

verses.name: Romans 11:9
verses.text: And David saith, Let their table be made a snare, and a trap, and a stumblingblock, and a recompence unto them:

verses.name: Romans 11:10
verses.text: Let their eyes be darkened, that they may not see, and bow down their back alway.
